ygData.subject: Re: armor
ygData.msgSnippet: It really depends on what level you are and your available funds. Flowing Black Robes (FBR) are very popular and can be bought for a little over 200pp from
ygData.messageBody:
It really depends on what level you are and your
available funds. Flowing Black Robes (FBR) are very popular
and can be bought for a little over 200pp from
players. But those are found in Najena which is in East
Antonica. <br><br>But it sounds like you're over in Fayder,
so you might want to try to buy a Robe of the Keeper
instead. They are dropped in Mistmoore which borders
Lesser Faydark. Players sell them for roughly 80pp,
which IMO is too much, but whatever.<br><br>These are
just some options available. These assume you are
between level 10 and 25. If you're above that, then you
probably already have a good robe. If you're below level
10, then I'd just be happy with the robe you started
with if I were you. :)<br><br>Nelmunbar<br>Enchanter
on Brell
